description: Due to an unexpected accident in one of the light music club`s live performances (and partly due to her attractive appearances), Mio acquired a huge amount of popularity, and even a fan club for her is formed (much to her dismay considering the circumstances surrounding it), whose founding member is the former student council president, http://anidb.net/ch16685 [Sokabe Megumi], who also stalks Mio. Yui`s childhood friend and Mio`s classmember and friend http://anidb.net/ch5521 [Manabe Nodoka] later becomes its president after Megumi graduates from school.
name: Akiyama Mio Fanclub
